posts.author: Reblar
posts.content:
Hello!

I'm quite frankly not very good at making builds so I'd like to request one. This is a necromancer that will be used on the Arelith server which has its level capped at 30. It's going to be more PVM focused as it's heavy summons and I figured that would be where it would shine better. I'm really not very picky about what race is used as I enjoy playing anything and can adapt to it in time. Having Pale Master incorporated in it will probably not happen as I don't have the requirements for it. Thanks in advance to anyone willing to help.

Additional Info:

http://wiki.arelith.com/Summoning_Changes
http://wiki.arelith.com/Spell_changes
http://wiki.arelith.com/Category:Race

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Hi Reblar, and welcome!

Alas, I'm the last person you want as your first responder - never played Arelith, never played an arcanist. However, until someone who knows what they're on about comes along, might I direct you to a thread on page 2 of this sub-forum, with the title *Cue Star Wars Opening Music*. Essentially, it's also about constructing a necromancer for Arelith, so it might well be of interest.

Sorry I can't be more useful, but someone who can will be along erelong.

Good to have you on board!
